articles.title: Head of Delegation of DPRK SPA on Stand to Contribute to Peace and Stability in Northeast Asia
articles.content:
Head of Delegation of DPRK SPA on Stand to Contribute to Peace and Stability in Northeast Asia
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- An Tong Chun, vice-chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK and head of the SPA delegation, made a speech at the 8th Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly on December 9.
					 He said that the security circumstances of the Asian region have become all the more complicated due to the arbitrariness and conflict of interests among powers with the strategic value growing in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula holds a very important proportion in ensuring peace and stability in Asia, he said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK aspires after peace and wants peaceful environment in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 What is valuable for the DPRK in guaranteeing the sustained economic development and substantially improving the people's living standard is peaceful environment. The escalation of tension on the Korean Peninsula is of no help to the DPRK.
					
					 Since the Armistice Agreement (AA) was concluded the DPRK has made fair and realistic proposals and suggestions for replacing the AA with a peace treaty and made persistent efforts with sincerity.
					
					 But the U.S., which is a party concerned and an administrator of the AA and exercising the OPECON of the south Korean army, and its followers have turned down the DPRK's just proposal.
					
					 It is the DPRK's consistent stand to put an end to the tension of the Korean Peninsula in a peaceful way through dialogue and negotiations and make contribution to peace and stability in the Northeast Asian region.
					
					 The DPRK is convinced that to replace the AA with a peace treaty and achieve the reunification by a federal formula is the way of substantially contributing to peace and stability in the Asia and will make all sincere efforts for it.

articles.title: 3rd National Conference of Financial and Banking Officials Held
articles.content:
3rd National Conference of Financial and Banking Officials Held
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- There took place the third national conference of financial and banking officials at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday. 
					 The conference reviewed successes and experience gained by those in the field of finance and banking in the past and discussed the tasks for reliably ensuring the financial guarantee for the building of a thriving nation and ways to do so. 
					
					 Present at the conference were Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, Vice-Premiers of the Cabinet Ro Tu Chol, Ri Mu Yong and Ri Chol Man, Minister of Finance Ki Kwang Ho, President of the Central Bank Kim Chon Gyun, President of the Foreign Trade Bank of the DPRK Kim Song Ui, leading officials of commissions, ministries, national institutions, provinces, cities and counties and exemplary financial and banking officials and persons of merit. 
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and premier of the Cabinet, read out the letter of Marshal Kim Jong Un to the participants in the conference "Let Us Dynamically Accelerate the Building of a Thriving Nation by Bringing about a Turn in Financial and Banking Work". 
					
					 In the letter Kim Jong Un said the financial and banking work in the DPRK has steadily developed, financially guaranteeing the socialist construction and the people's material and cultural life under the deep care and leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The President set forth the unique idea of finance and banking which embodied the principle of the Juche idea and established the advantageous Korean-style financial and banking management system for solving all the problems arising in the financial and banking work in line with the independent demand and interests of the popular masses, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche-oriented idea and theory of finance and banking of the President to provide the guidelines for improving the financial and banking work and established the party's leadership system on the work and took revolutionary measures for the steady development of the financial and banking system. 
					
					 To improve the financial and banking work is an inevitable demand for hastening the building of a thriving nation. Reliable financial resources are necessary to build the people's paradise featured by strong national power and great prosperity.
					
					 It is necessary to financially guarantee the party's Songun revolutionary leadership and the building of a thriving socialist nation by consolidating the financial foundations of the country and ensuring fluent circulation of currency. This is the general task for the financial and banking field. 
					
					 The financial and banking officials should always bear in mind the deep trust and expectation of the party and successfully fulfill their lofty duty before the country and people and bring about a fresh turn in the financial and banking work. 
					
					 Ro Tu Chol, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-premier of the Cabinet and chairman of the State Planning Commission, made a report. 
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Un saw to it that the conference was held, and sent the letter to indicate the orientation and ways for improving the financial and banking work. 
					
					 All the successes in the financial and banking work are a precious fruition of the undying efforts of the great leaders and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, the reporter noted. 
					
					 He called for firmly establishing the monolithic leadership system of Kim Jong Un and orientating the financial and banking work to implementing the line and policy of the party. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the conference.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Participants in National Conference of Financial and Banking Officials
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Participants in National Conference of Financial and Banking Officials
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- A birthday party for the participants in the third national conference of financial and banking officials was given at the April 25 Hotel on Sunday.
					 Present at the party were O Su Yong and Ro Tu Chol, officials concerned and the participants who marked their birthdays during the conference.
					
					 O Su Yong, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a speech.
					
					 He congratulated the participants on their birthdays, saying that the birthday party was given under the warm care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called on them to bear in mind the honor and take the lead in carrying out the tasks set forth in Kim Jong Un's letter without fail to repay the party's trust and loving care with great success in their work and thus glorify every moment of their lives as vanguard fighter defending the leader unto death and a genuine financial and banking official.

articles.title: Chairman of International Military Sports Council Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chairman of International Military Sports Council Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Abdulhakeem Mohamed Isa Alshanoo, chairman of the International Military Sports Council, and his companion visited Mangyongdae.
					 Being briefed on the historic home in Mangyongdae where the President Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood, nurturing his great ambition of the revolution, the guests looked round the relics preserved with much care at the home.
					
					 They climbed Mangyong Hill to look round revolutionary sites.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the May Day Stadium, etc.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Demand Introduction of Tuition Waiver Program for Korean Schools in Japan
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Demand Introduction of Tuition Waiver Program for Korean Schools in Japan
Tokyo, December 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- There held a demo demanding the introduction of the tuition waiver program for the Korean schools in Japan before the building of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan in Tokyo on Dec. 11.
					 Participants in the demo included officials of the General Association of the Korean Residents in Japan, teaching staff and students of the Korean University and Korean high schools, parents of the students, Koreans in Japan, a representative of the liaison society against the exclusion of the Korean schools from the program and other figures of the Japanese public organizations.
					
					 They said it is a legitimate right of the Korean students to get national education, and the measure of the Japanese government is an open discrimination of the Koreans in Japan and an intolerable human rights abuse. 
					
					 They demanded the Japanese authorities stop the discrimination policy and apply the program to the Korean schools.
					
					 They noted that all the Koreans in Japan including the students would fight for the settlement of the issue.

articles.title: Hypocrisy Aimed at Introducing "State-Compiled" History Textbook Slammed
articles.content:
Hypocrisy Aimed at Introducing "State-Compiled" History Textbook Slammed
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The Network for Checking Introduction of "State-compiled" Textbook of south Korea released a commentary revealing the hypocrisy of the "committee for compiling national history" on Dec. 11.
					 The commentary said it was confirmed that a disqualified teacher was included in the writing staff of the "state-compiled textbook".
					
					 The teacher was recommended by the "committee for compiling national history", the commentary noted, adding:
					
					 In the long run, the assertion of the "committee for compiling national history" that its writing staff is made up of "distinguished professionals of the academic circle" was proved to be a hypocrisy to evade the blames on the introduction of the "state-compiled history textbook", the commentary held.
					
					 It urged the "government" to open to the public all members of the writing staff hidden behind the scene and to stop the history coup embellishing the pro-Japanese dictatorship.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Iran, Peru, Mexico
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Iran, Peru, Mexico
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- There took place round-table talks and photo exhibition in Iran, seminar in Peru and lecture in Mexico on Dec. 5 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 And there were also their works and books and photos introducing the achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran said that Kim Jong Il's immovable stand of independence against imperialism serves as the noble example for the world progressives fighting for justice.
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, said that the revolutionary exploits and lives of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk would be remembered forever by the world progressives as well as the people of Peru.
					
					 Andres Gasca Sanchez, president of the Mexican Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, said that Kim Jong Il performed immortal feats for the world socialist cause and human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Figures
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars in Moscow and Sankt-Peterburg of Russia and a remembrance meeting in Ulyanovsk on Dec. 7 in the run-up to the 4th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 Present there were the Russian personages of all strata and masses.
					
					 Revedev, administrative secretary of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il was on a winning streak in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces without gunfire and that he brought about a new era of the building of a thriving nation by pursuing his Songun politics.
					
					 Kudimin, director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the road of the times and mankind through his outstanding ideo-theoretical activities and that he solved all problems arising in the revolution and construction guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 He laid firm foundations for accomplishing the socialist cause despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK by perfectly solving the issue of succession to the leadership, he noted. 
					
					 The secretary of the Ulyanovsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Kim Jong Il is the people's father who devoted his all to happiness of the people and the great commander who always defeated the imperialist allied forces on the strength of the powerful arms.
					
					 Messages to Marshal Kim Jong Un were adopted in the seminars held in Moscow and Sankt-Peterburg.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bulgarian Organization
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association made public the December issue of its bulletin.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "4th anniversary of demise of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il" said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il passed away on the road of field guidance to our regret on December 17, 2011.
					
					 He visited every nook and corner of the DPRK almost everyday to meet the people and learned their difficulties, wishes and dream more than any others.
					
					 We will remember his august name forever as he performed great exploits for the country, the people and global independence.
					
					 He unrolled a far-reaching plan for building a thriving nation in such a difficult period and brought about historic changes.
					
					 He also provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration to make a breakthrough for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 His feats are that he frustrated the moves of the imperialist allied forces getting frantic day by day after the collapse of socialism in different countries, defended socialism of the DPRK and provided a turning phase for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried in Bulletin of Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried in Bulletin of Bulgarian Organization
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- A brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was carried by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in the December issue of its bulletin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar in Sweden, lecture in South Africa and reading session in Guinea from November 27 to December 5 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the events were personages of various circles and masses of relevant countries.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il represents the banner of the struggle for independence of not only the Korean people but also the world progressive people.
					
					 The secretary general of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il, born in Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution, firmly protected the socialist country from provocations by all hostile forces and opened the new era for independent reunification.
					
					 He said that the august name and exploits of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, would always be remembered along with Mt. Paektu.
